${modID}:Defend.NAME: Defend
${modID}:Defend.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Trigger your passive ${modID}:Carbon regeneration.

${modID}:Respite.NAME: Respite
${modID}:Respite.DESCRIPTION: Consume !${modID}:Cost!% ${modID}:Carbon. NL Draw a card for each !M! ${modID}:Carbon consumed.

${modID}:Terror.NAME: Terror
${modID}:Terror.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable and Weak. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Diamond.NAME: Diamond
${modID}:Diamond.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Ethereal NL Enter ${modID}:Diamond. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Graphite.NAME: Graphite
${modID}:Graphite.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Ethereal NL Enter ${modID}:Graphite. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Amorphic.NAME: Amorphic
${modID}:Amorphic.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Ethereal NL Enter ${modID}:Amorphic. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Contagion.NAME: Contagion
${modID}:Contagion.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Lose !${modID}:Magic1! max HP NL Gain max ${modID}:Carbon NL Gain !M! ${modID}:Contagion.

${modID}:Regenerate.NAME: Regenerate
${modID}:Regenerate.DESCRIPTION: Consume !${modID}:Cost!% ${modID}:Carbon. NL Heal for !${modID}:Effect1!% ${modID}:Carbon. NL Exhaust

${modID}:TempoStrike.NAME: Tempo Strike
${modID}:TempoStrike.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Consume !${modID}:Cost!% ${modID}:Carbon. NL Deal !${modID}:Effect1!% ${modID}:Carbon damage. NL Draw !M! card{!M!|>1=s}

${modID}:Harvest.NAME: Harvest
${modID}:Harvest.DESCRIPTION: {@@}{!Upgrades!|>0=Retain. NL }Deal !D! damage. NL If Fatal, ${modID}:Harvest. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:DomainExpansion.NAME: Domain Expansion
${modID}:DomainExpansion.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, deal !M!% ${modID}:Carbon damage to all enemies.

${modID}:WeakSpot.NAME: Weak Spot
${modID}:WeakSpot.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If the enemy has Weak, apply !M! Vulnerable.

${modID}:VulnerableSpot.NAME: Vulnerable Spot
${modID}:VulnerableSpot.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If the enemy has Vulnerable, apply !M! Weak.

${modID}:GatheringStorm.NAME: Gathering Storm
${modID}:GatheringStorm.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Deal !${modID}:Effect1!% ${modID}:Carbon damage. NL When this card is retained, increase it's damage by !${modID}:Effect2!% ${modID}:Carbon.

${modID}:Leftovers.NAME: Leftovers
${modID}:Leftovers.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Whenever you consume ${modID}:Carbon, return this from the discard pile to your hand.

${modID}:BloodAttack.NAME: Blood Attack
${modID}:BloodAttack.DESCRIPTION: Consume !${modID}:Cost!% ${modID}:Carbon. NL Deal !${modID}:Effect1!% ${modID}:Carbon damage. NL Lose !M! HP.

${modID}:FutureSight.NAME: Future Sight
${modID}:FutureSight.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Consume !${modID}:Cost! ${modID}:Carbon. NL Scry for each ${modID}:Carbon consumed. NL Draw !M! card{!M!|>1=s}."
